name: theRealEvilDoer

messages: I'm stream sniping I'm stream sniping

appeal_message: Did I get banned for cheating in game? I know cheating is prohibited when playing, but why did I get banned for chatting about it? That seems out of your paygrade lolll you're just the streamer. Put the fries in the bag man
